data.text: Tweaduampɔn, Onyankopɔn, Awurade no kasa,
Onyankopɔn hran firi Sion
Yɛn Onyankopɔn reba nanso ɔrenyɛ komm;
Ɔfrɛ ɔsorosoro ne asase,
Ɔka sɛ, “Boaboa nnipa a wɔate wɔn ho no ano ma me,
Ɔsoro pae mu ka ne tenenee,
“Montie, me nkurɔfoɔ na mɛkasa,
Merenka mo anim wɔ mo afɔrebɔdeɛ
Anantwinini a wɔfiri mo mfuo so
ɛfiri sɛ kwaeɛ mu aboa biara yɛ me dea,
Menim anomaa biara a ɔwɔ mmepɔ no so,
Sɛ ɛkɔm dee me a, anka merenka nkyerɛ mo;
Mewe anantwinini nam,
Momfa aseda afɔdeɛ mma Onyankopɔn,
na momfrɛ me da hiada;
Nanso, amumuyɛfoɔ deɛ, Onyankopɔn bisa wɔn sɛ,
Mokyiri me nkyerɛkyerɛ
Sɛ mohunu ɔkorɔmfoɔ a, mode mo ho bɔ no;
Mode mo ano yɛ bɔne
Mokasa tia mo nuabarima ɛberɛ biara
Moayɛ yeinom nyinaa; nanso manka hwee,
“Monnwene yei ho, mo a mo werɛ firi Onyankopɔn,
Deɛ ɔbɔ aseda afɔdeɛ no hyɛ me animuonyam,
